articles.description: A photograph taken in the Dutch artist’s studio shortly after his death suggests "New York City I" has been displayed the wrong way round since 1945
articles.content: A key work from Piet Mondrians late period has potentially been hanging upside down for more than 75 years. The work by the Dutch artist (1872-1944) is included in a new exhibition, Mondrian: Evoluti… [+4094 chars]

articles.author: Hayley Anderson
articles.title: Travelling Auctioneers star Christina Trevanion pays tribute to ‘little brother’ Will Kirk - Express
articles.description: The Travelling Auctioneers will see the worlds of Bargain Hunt and The Repair Shop collide on BBC One.
